abstract: Letter from Janet Benshoof, president, Global Justice Center, responds to Oct 5 Thant Myint-U Op-Ed column about Myanmar needing United States support to further transition to democracy.
snippet: Readers response to an Op-Ed about the new government in Myanmar.
lead_paragraph: Readers response to an Op-Ed about the new government in Myanmar.

headline.main: Barriers to Bringing Real Change to Myanmar
headline.print_headline: Barriers to Bringing Real Change to Myanmar
